title: Riot: "We removed graves cigar for certain regional censors"
body: I completely understand. However, if you want League of Legends to eventually be marketed to everyone, you may need a bit more censoring. All you really need to do is replace anything that could be offensive or controversial to *anyone* with something less threatening. Baby chickens are pretty safe. Here are some suggestions:

replies.body: as per request
LoL

you forgot all the overly revealing champions
and their skins.
ex:{{champion:84}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} 
to name a few

But seriously, I miss Grave's cigar :(

amumu is a mummy,he is completely wrapped up in bandages,who are basically his clothes.
Blitzcrank is a robot,I doubt that he identifies as either male or female(same goes for malphite&Galio,Maokai might be different because he's a tree spirit)
Nautilus is fused to his clothes,but they are still clothes
Rengar wears quite much,only his head,small part of his arms and one leg are exposed
Rumble is fully clothed,its just hard to see his body from above,same goes for Ziggs
Yorick is also pretty much fully clothed,he shows a bit back and arms,thats all.

If you do a joke,then do it right!
Amumu's clothes r too tight and revealing, git mi teenage hormones in a tizzy.

Eldritch hellspawn from a hungry dimension that lurks where you can't see her and devours the unfortunate passerby? Fine.
Cute girl who plays music, wears a semi-modest dress, and has a large bust? Horribly indecent, censore that ASAP.

Champions shamelessly promote serial killing, insanity, sociopathic tendencies, and improper bomb disposal methods? Meh. Sure.
Gragas supporting drinking? Inappropriate for kids! They need to perform healthy All-American activities like watching the Super Bowl. Oh. Wait...

People getting massacred, literally loved to death, kama'd, messing with bulls, getting terminally depressed, getting frostbitten by an ice storm, meeting Tibbers, getting arrowed, stabbed, grabbed, set on fire a few dozen times, smashed in the face, headshotted, petrified, messily devoured, airstriked, dunked, mooned by an attractive female, going where Mundo pleases, DRAAAAAAAAAVEN, getting spiderbitten, shanked by a scantily clad woman, blasted by an explorer, crowed by the scarecrow, dueled, sharked, taunted by a gargoyle, shanked again, *JUSTICE*... ified, *GNAR!*ed, drunk, shot up by a bounty hunter, terrified to death, drone-striked, shanked *again*, left breathless, dead in a ditch, getting bopped, shot at, shot at *then* rocketed, speared (by their allies), Karma being a **[censored]**, defiled by an old dude, silenced by a transhuman assassin, shanked yet *another* time, getting on the wrong side of justice, struck by lightning, riddled with spikes, vomited on, deceived cruelly, kicked violently into each other, hit by solar flares, frozen in an icy tomb, shot yet again, hugeified, lasered, body-slammed, getting space-AIDS, discovering why pollution is bad kids, getting curbstomped by one one guy, getting shock-and-awed, forcibly resurrected and tortured into obedience, getting their soul snared, deluged in a tidal wave, getting their soul *eaten*, smashed with an anchor, talking about mating season with a cougar, facing their worst nightmare, yeti'd, axe-murdered, mercilessly slaughtered by a clockwork killing machine made from the memories of an innocent girl, shield -bopped, tackled, eye-gouged, spiked, ambushed from below, ambushed from plain sight, ambushed from the *bush*, shanked *by the wind* with a *sword* (that makes sense), immolated with napalm, imprisoned, flash-frozen, Joker'd, ninja'd, dragon'd, gassed by a mad scientist, slaughtered to empower an undead juggernaut, crossbladed by a desert cutthroat, impaled by a giant scorpion, rent asunder by music, hit by a literal falling star, shredded by a crow demon, hit with a wave of overwhelming dark power, shanked *in the back*, smashed in the face with a hammer, meeting ***Satan***, having their souls damned to eternal imprisonment, having an explosive charge detonated directly above their heads, trolled, raged at, cheated, shot at by a deranged plague rat, beaten up by a big wild dude with a beard, spiked by Executioner Robocop, ensnared by a dude's long tendril, killed by a werewolf hunter, deleted by the master of evil, disintegrated, assaulted and battered, zapped by a cyborg, exsanguinated, roared at, mauled by a werewolf, cudgeled in the face, mortared magically, knocked up, kept up, gruesomely resurrected by a gravedigger, slimed by the green goo monster, marked for death, fire-bombed, time-bombed, and stepping on a *lot* of thorns... is apparently okay.
But Sion showing some bones is 2edgy5theinternet.

green goo monster, marked for death, fire-bombed, time-bombed, and stepping on a *lot* of thorns... is apparently okay.

^ definition of over-explaining

Also, you have WAY too much free time.

Also, pointless because everyone has different levels of tolerance for different things.

Also it's far more likely that a kid is going to be able to pick up smoking than pick up a shotgun and go shooting people. Which is why depicting smoking as cool is actually more harmful than depicting killing people as cool.

For one, most kids have enough common sense to not go and murder people IRL... but they don't necessarily have the common sense to not start smoking. Two completely different things here. One is just mainly affecting yourself and the other is affecting other people.

> Also, you have WAY too much free time.

Guilty as charged.
Please, a chicken covering eve's scantily clad body is in order too.

Thing is there are several levels of taboos.
If I make a movie and don't want gore in it so that I can target a wider audience,does that mean that I need to make a kids-movie with no violence at all?

No.
Cigars are a big problem in some countries and its easy to get them out of the game,but the same can't be said about bombs,alcohol,guns,swords and taric.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=GIE9sbWP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-20T01:03:26.290+0000)
>
> Thing is there are several levels of taboos.
> If I make a movie and don't want gore in it so that I can target a wider audience,does that mean that I need to make a kids-movie with no violence at all?
> 
> No.
> Cigars are a big problem in some countries and its easy to get them out of the game,but the same can't be said about bombs,alcohol,guns,swords and taric.

Yes but they're just as easy to split between regions as they are to remove from the game.  I mean really its a line that's a single texture file and it's been iconic to the character for years yet they're so willing to just delete it from everyone just to satisfy one or two countries that are niche target audiences?  IMO that's just bullshit.  Karthus is something I can understand since keeping and updating two high detail models is hard, but Graves' cigar is easily something you could have between servers with no conflict.  I mean hell it's what they've been doing for Vlad for years (BBQ sauce blood lol), and they'd likely just subtly change gragas' lore to make him a juice mage if there was a country that had alcohol as a taboo.  I don't know why Graves is this exception of an easy change they decided needed to be global.

This post shows that you have no idea about graves cigar.

You say the cigar was iconic to graves for years,despite the fact that graves simply never smoked.
The only times where we saw him with a cigar was in the "new-dawn"-video and the splash art that was released shortly afterwards and the cigar was removed in one or two patches.

So there is a giganitc difference between graves cigar,that was only present in his splash art for a short time and gragas alcohol,which basically makes up most of his character and was always the core of his character.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=GIE9sbWP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-20T01:03:26.290+0000)
> Cigars are a big problem in some countries and its easy to get them out of the game,but the same can't be said about bombs,alcohol,guns,swords and taric.

Real people who smoke real cigarettes are a problem. Having a single fictional character who smokes cigars is not a problem, and it's stupid to censor it.

> less threatening. Baby chickens are pretty safe.

You sir, haven't played enough Legend of Zelda.

This isn't about Riot's opinion... It's about certain laws in other countries. As in, Riot wouldn't be allowed to have the game in certain countries if that stayed in. If you hate that, you should start hating on countries like Uruguay and their anti-tobacco laws.

If you just wanted to include some funny photoshops, kudos. I don't mean to drag down the party. They are funny. But there is a real reason that they needed to do that for their game to be available in some regions.

Blizzard had a whole different version of Diablo 3 produced so that China could play without being offended by skeletons or skulls or any of that crap.

Riot buckled and changed things even though we can't play with China from our server over here anyway.
Gragas looks like he's defending that baby chicken from the rest of the bar.
Did they remove the cigar from Gragas Esq yet?
Chicken Cho'Goth is amazing.

Still waiting for skeletons to make a comeback.
Stop favoring China over everyone else, Riot. {{champion:30}}

A little late, but the cigar thing was beyond retarded. Just change the art in the 3 places that dislike it, and stop fucking with everything else. 
If they didn't like that, well they should stop having double standards with allt he rest of the champs. Censor everything if you are gonna censor something so stupid, stop half-assing everything.
Killing people with shotguns is perfectly acceptable but smoking is bad, mkay?

Peoples... this has to do with *exclusively* legal reasons (generally promoting smoking use to children; LoL being able to maintain a Rated "T" for Teen rating by ESRB without content descriptor of "Use of Tobacco" being added) and **NOTHING** to do with "regional preferences".


This thread is of the Bronze Level of Intellectual Understanding of 21 Century Earth Civilization.... get better educations in schools or elsewhere please before making stupid posts here...


Some of us perhaps weren't even born yet when games such as "The Legend of Zelda:  Ocarina of Time" was sued (and Nintendo caved twice in undisclosed settlements) for issues such as:

1. The Original "Fire Temple" music sounding "too Muslimy" and was a secret attempt by Nintendo to enact Shria Law in USA (this was pre-9/11 and Islam was a fair target apparently).  Post legal settlement the vocals of the soundtrack were removed.
2.  Gannon's Blood was "red" (in the final end game scene where he is defeated), and of course being the same as human blood color, the game MUST of course therefore be Rated "M" for Mature (the color post-suit was changed in all games to green).


So please... stop making retarded posts here in this thread trashing RIOT.  Losers  file fake lawsuits like candy every day in attempts to get a fast settlement, and even if video game companies win, they usually spend far more in legal fees because their opponents are bankrupt (and generally) single moms "against video game violence" with no assets or otherwise.


Indeed it is so...
